title: Championship Skins
body: With worlds starting soon, I was wondering when we would know what championship skins will be available for purchase?

replies.body: I didnt know that was a thing

I don't have any info on that yet, but I encourage you to keep your eyes peeled and keep checking on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for the official announcement.

Let me know if you have any questions.
